attributes.action: Take legal action to prevent power companies from using their latest scam 'free on Saturday' to increase Sunday to Friday prices.
attributes.additional_details: This latest manipulation of letting us have 'free' electricity on Saturdays is merely a pre-cursor to increasing the cost of units (and therefore their immoral level of profits (ALL OF WHICH GOES OVERSEAS! MANY THANKS TO OUR DISHONOURABLE ELECTEDS WHO SOLD IT ALL OFF)) on electricity supplied during the rest of the week when people, naturally, use more of it running the household for workers and schoolchildren.  THIS SCAM NEEDS TO BE STOPPED BUT OUR DISHONOURABLES HAVE NO POWER SO WE MUST RELY ON OUR LEGAL SYSTEM.
